sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import {Card,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' function Movie({search , getFavorites, getFavoriteMovie}) { const [film,setFilm]=useState([]) const getfilm= ()=>{ fetch('data.json').then( response => response.json()).then (movies => setFilm(movies)); } useEffect(()=> {getfilm()},[]) return( search ===''?
{film.map(el=> {el.Title} {el.Awards} {el.Rate} )}
: film.filter(el=> el.Title.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase())).map(el=> {el.Title} {el.Awards} {el.Rate} ) ) } export default Movie
